nodes.text: Lopar was a male Chiss who served in the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force in cooperation with the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, he was stationed at Dorn Base on the planet Hoth.
Lopar appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Specialty Goods Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
